page.title: 09Worlingworth Food Processors
page.content: Q1What comes into & out of your factory? A1We are a food factory making high grade pates,smoked chicken,duck & turkey.Our pates also contain cheese, vegetables & milk.We have a widespread market including top class London stores. The ingredients we buy include pork legs,pigs liver,belly pork,quail, chicken & turkey.We also use a wide range of packaging materials eg.printed labels,cardboard boxes & vacuum bags. Q2How do you influence Worlingworth? A2We provide employment both directly & indirectly & pay substantial rates. We also attract better services to the village. Q3What changes do you expect in the near future? A3The factory is being sold & will be managed by the new owner.The change should not affect Worlingworth.
